description: As you make your way further in the village, the western walls
blocks passage and detours you in two possible directions.  One
direction takes you north and the other back east to the main gates.
9978.name: Southeast Turn

description: You inhale deeply and smell the fresh oven-baked, mouth-watering
delicacies being made here in the food and rations shop.  The delicious
smells make your tummy shiver and growl furiously as you reach for your gold
to buy these tasty foods.  An exit leads out to the south.
9958.name: Travels and Delights

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street path
continues to the west and east here.
9942.name: Northeast Main Street

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  D The street takes
a turn to the south while the other direction takes you out into the
mainway.
9905.name: Southwest Main Street

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  A store lies to the
north where items for travelling are being sold.  The street continues west
and east here.
9943.name: Northeast Main Street

description: You are on the main avenue of the village, which goes north and
south here, and opens to a wide road to the eastern gates.  The
village is littered with many straw and red clay topped buildings from
which rise smoke and a sense of good feelings.  You can tell this road
is well traveled.
9932.name: North/South Path

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The flow of traffic
here paces fairly as people move about in typical fashion.  The streets
continue east and west here.
9959.name: Northwest Main Street

description: A turn in the path goes north where much activity can be heard.  Festive
decorations are hanging around you as something interesting must be taking
place in the center square.
9912.name: Southwestern Corner

description: Strange unknown markings are written all over the walls to your west and
east.  A strange glow emits about the room somehow giving light as you enter
here.  The marks seem to be a collaboration of many pictures telling a story
as you gaze across the walls here.  Several dead pieces of meat and bones
lie about here with blotches of blood all over..  I think you better leave.
A tiny mouse scatters by you and suddenly disappears in the middle of the
ground here..  You wonder.
9971.name: Cave

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.
9907.name: Southwest Main Street

description: You are now standing outside the gates on what is known as a village of
sort.  The structure outside is layered with fine bricks and the village
seems to be newly built and magnificent in its presence.  Tall flags stand
high on the high towers to your left and right with several guards perched
high on the lookout for any signs of war.  A trail leads away from the
village to the east, while the gates prevent your way in to the west.
9935.name: Before the East Gates of a Village

description: On the eastern wall stands a great statue of Lord Dzavar, former
merchant, and head of Hilp Village.  Although many villagers have not seen
him, much talk has been heard of his many good exploits.  Commoners are seen
moving back and forth here while some are sightseeing this grand statue and
studying it.  Festive decorations furnish around this square giving a sense
of excitement and fun to those travelling from afar.  A path veers to the
north and south from here while high spirits can be heard to the west.
9922.name: East End Square

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.
9909.name: Southwest Main Street

description: The path suddenly turns dark as dead branches and thick green bushes
merge into the passage forcing you to move aside the plants.  To the east,
the light is much brighter while to the west..  Darkness is all to be seen.
9919.name: Thick Plantation

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street resumes
to the west and east here.
9926.name: Southeast Main Street

description: Welcome to all who enter this fair village of Hilp.  We embrace all
who've come from distant lands around to enter and enjoy this fair
establishment of tranquility, happiness and love as shown from the head of
the Hilp Village, Lord Dzavar and his royal highness, King Azoun.  We hope
that you enjoy your visit here and may you come back again as well.
The citizens of Hilp
As you make your way further in the village, the eastern walls blocks
passage and detours you in two possible directions.  One direction takes you
north and the other south.  A SIGN is perched on the wall here for you to
read.
9902.name: North/South Path

description: The street suddenly curves to the east further into the village.  A
lot of grunting and clanking of stones can be heard at the small guard
station to the west where the cityguards dwell during their offtime
from patrolling the streets.
9962.name: Western Turn

description: You are trapped in a room with nothing to be seen, heard, or used.  Recall yourself out of here.. there is nothing here!
9949.name: Empty Room of Nothingness

description: You are now standing outside the southern gates of Hilp Village.  Here,
the path leading south continues at a distance where the darkness unknown is
seen afar.  Several shrubs of greenery grow alongside the path as the
meadows are seen in plain view.  A gate takes you back in Hilp to the north
while south of you the path continues.
9915.name: Outside the Villagetown Square

description: You are now standing outside the gates on what is known as a village of
sort.  The structure outside is layered with fine bricks and the village
seems to be newly built and magnificent in its presence.  Tall flags stand
high on the high towers to your left and right with several guards perched
high on the lookout for any signs of war.  A trail leads away from the
village to the west, while the gates prevent your way in to the east.
9900.name: Before the West Gates of a Village

description: The street suddenly curves to the west further into the village.
A lot of grunting and clanking of stones can be heard at the small
guard station to the east where the cityguards dwell during
their offtime from patrolling the streets.
9936.name: Northeast Turn

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street makes
its way west and east here.
9939.name: Northeast Main Street

description: The north/south path continues here.  Along the east is the walls
of the village and to the west are many red bricked buildings.  One
direction takes you north, the other takes you south where there is a
cove and a western turn.
9976.name: North/South Path

description: A turn in the path goes south where much activity can be heard.  Festive
decorations are hanging around you as something interesting must be taking
place in the center square.
9945.name: Northeastern Corner

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  A store where many
of the finest weapons are being sold lies to the north.  Rumor has it that
King Azoun's weapons of the past are also being sold there too.  The street
continues west and east here.
9940.name: Northeast Main Street

description: You are now standing in front of the mouth of the cave.  Loud breathing
can be heard as a mist of fog suddenly from nowhere floats about you.  You
shiver for a moment and decide what to do next, enter or leave.
9967.name: Mouth of a Cave

description: 'Many blessings and thanks to Lord Dzavar and King Azoun for their approvals in the special weapons that were donated from them!'
Many enchanted weapons from warriors of the past hang along the northern
wall of the shop.  A hot fiery furnace is also amongst the northern end of
the shop providing a blacksmith to create weapons for customers.  Portraits
of lost warriors are hung along the western and eastern walls with a long
counter before you full of many different weapons not for sale.  An exit
takes you out into the main street to the south.  A sign is here for you to
read.
9941.name: Weaponrys of Victory

description: A turn in the path goes north where much activity can be heard.  Festive
decorations are hanging around you as something interesting must be taking
place in the center square.
9923.name: Southeastern Corner

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.
9906.name: Southwest Main Street

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street abruptly
ends and spins to the north.
9938.name: Northeast Main Street

description: Welcome to all who enter this fair village of Hilp.  We embrace all
who've come from distant lands around to enter and enjoy this fair
establishment of tranquility, happiness and love as shown from the head of
the Hilp Village, Lord Dzavar and his royal highness, King Azoun.  We hope
that you enjoy your visit here and may you come back again as well.
The citizens of Hilp
The north/south path continues here.  Along the east is the walls
of the village and to the west are many red bricked buildings.  One
direction takes you north, further into the village.  The other goes
south back to the eastern gates of the village.
9933.name: North/South Path

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.
9910.name: Southwest Main Street

description: You are trapped in a room with nothing to be seen, heard, or used.  Recall yourself out of here.. there is nothing here!
9947.name: Empty Room of Nothingness

description: A turn in the path goes south where much activity can be heard.  Festive
decorations are hanging around you as something interesting must be taking
place in the center square.
9953.name: Northwestern Corner

description: The street makes an abrupt turn northward further into the village.
The village walls lie southward and sparse rows of houses and village
buildings stretch across the northern lots.
9981.name: Western Turn

description: Several beds furnish along the western and eastern walls here.  A huge
set of stone weights are lying in the middle of the floor used for strength
training in keeping the guards physically fit.  Not much is to be seen in
the room but several lost guards from the past.  To the south takes you back
into the village where life resumes.
9965.name: Guard Room

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  A shop for
purchasing potions and vials is visible to the south.  The street continues
to the west and east here.
9924.name: Southeast Main Street

description: The roof above opens up to the skies allowing nature to shine
itself through in here.  Several birds fly across the square as many
people wander about looking at the grand statue of King Azoun,
honorary monarch of Hilp Village.  A crowd of children run across here
laughing joyously and cheering as several commoners also stroll by
from the street going about their daily lives.  Several vendors are up
in this busy section of the town stopping folks and persuading them in
buying black market items.  The paved street moves east and west here.
9914.name: Villagetown Square

description: "We thank Lord Dzavar and King Azoun for donating their historic items for sale here at the Wilderness store!"
The store here seems somewhat bare but a long counter standing across
from left to right here full of many equipment full of travels for you to
see.  A sign is posted here for you to read.
9944.name: Store of Wilderness

description: This dingy shop is filled with all manner of armor and equipment
sure to keep a green-footed adventurer well prepared for the simplest
of life's exciting moments.  The shopkeeper stands behind his small
counter busying himself with a rag and some spit, shining up a piece
of armor.  He looks up briefly to smile, and continues his work, but
certainly is glad to have any business he can find.
9928.name: Protective Covering Emporium

description: A tall thick-layered monument of a mighty warrior saturated in full body
armor stands high on the western wall attracting passer-bys at this western
square.  A high circular stain-glass window of a warrior, with his sword
raised high atop a hill, is illustrated colorfully.  Graceful decorations
are hung across this indoor square filled with many historic weapons and
armor as well as sacred scrolls covered in see-thru glass displays.  A good
deal of people are wandering about gazing in interest the town of Hilp and
its history.  More activity can be heard to the east while a turn in the
path is visible to the north and south.
9913.name: West End Square

description: The meadows around this grassy path are furnished with many bushes, trees
and tall grass as several signs of wildlife are heard around.  A fair
village to the west is standing as you peer that way.  The grassy trail
continues east and west.
9969.name: Grassy Field

description: The grassy trail continues east and west here.  The sounds of nature can
be felt and heard around you as you stroll along this path.  The structure
to the west seems to grow in size the closer you approach to it.
9970.name: Grassy Field

description: You are trapped in a room with nothing to be seen, heard, or used.  Recall yourself out of here.. there is nothing here!
9916.name: Empty Room of Nothingness

description: Several beds furnish along the western and eastern walls here.  A huge
set of stone weights are lying in the middle of the floor used for strength
training in keeping the guards physically fit.  Not much is to be seen in
the room but several lost guards from the past.  To the north takes you back
into the village where life resumes.
9964.name: Guard Room

description: This room is filled with torches perched along the western and eastern
walls with many historic artifacts from the history of Hilp on the northern
wall here.  The room is primarily used for those wishing to donate their
booty here for others to have.  An exit leads out to the south.
9955.name: Room of Donations

description: Several beds furnish along the western and eastern walls here.  A huge
set of stone weights are lying in the middle of the floor used for strength
training in keeping the guards physically fit.  Not much is to be seen in
the room but several lost guards from the past.  To the south takes you back
into the village where life resumes.
9963.name: Guard Room

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort
for those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide
enough to allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is
somewhat scattered with soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the
road here.  A place to donate and leave your items is visible to the
north.  The street endlessly goes west and east here.
9954.name: Northwest Main Street

description: The room here is total black!!!  You can't see your way around here!!!
The mist of cold air swarms around you..  You shiver.
9972.name: Black Tunnelway Into

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  A tasty food place
of sorts can be seen to the north where the smell is enchanting to the
stomach that yearns.  The street continues to the east and west here.
9957.name: Northwest Main Street

description: Candles are seen perched along the corners of the room with crystalized
pedestals standing beneath them.  The smell of incense enchants you as your
eyes see the magnificence of this sanctuary.  Golden portraits of immortals
are seen at the far end of the room with golden furnishings symmetrically
stood side by side.  A huge woven rug is seated at the center of the room
for those in wanting of meditation and praying.  An exit is out to the
north.
9908.name: Sanctuary of the High Priest

description: This short walkway turns to the west quickly further into the
village.  Several portraits of lost warriors from the past hang on the
southern and eastern walls.  Small candles are hung beside them as
well.
9979.name: Southeast Main Street

description: This short walkway turns to the south quickly further into the
village.  Several portraits of lost warriors from the past hang on the
southern and eastern walls.  Small candles are hung beside them as
well.
9937.name: Northeast Turn

description: This short walkway turns to the east quickly further into the village.
Several portraits of lost warriors from the past hang on the southern and
western walls.  Small candles are hung beside them as well.
9903.name: North/South Path

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street
continues west and east of here.
9956.name: Northwest Main Street

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort
for those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide
enough to allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is
somewhat scattered with soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the
road here.
9930.name: Southeast Main Street

description: We thank mighty Lord Dzavar and King Azoun for their approval and praise in the special magical items that are being sold here!
You eyes suddenly light up as you enter into a laboratory of some sort.
Strange chemical-like odors can be smelt with many bubbly flasks of magical
vials about here.  An exit takes you out to the north.  A sign is here for
you to read.
9925.name: Concotions of the Adventurers

description: Welcome to the unknown village!  It seems that alot of activity seems to
be brewing as you enter the village.  Many travellers come from distant
lands in hopes of purchasing unique items sold here or to visit those that
dwell in this establishment.  The ground beneath you is well layered with a
hard brick surface allowing those to move about easily into the village.
Huge gates are standing to your east that lead itself out of town.  A dead
end can be seen distantly to your west as the path takes you deeper in this
animated village.
9934.name: Inside the Eastern Gates

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  The street makes a
sharp turn to the north here.  To the east, the streets are more outspoken
with a traffic of people walking about.
9960.name: Northwest Main Street

description: Welcome to all who enter this fair village of Hilp.  We embrace all
who've come from distant lands around to enter and enjoy this fair
establishment of tranquility, happiness and love as shown from the head of
the Hilp Village, Lord Dzavar and his royal highness, King Azoun.  We hope
that you enjoy your visit here and may you come back again as well.
The citizens of Hilp
As you make your way further in the village, the eastern walls
blocks passage and detours you in two possible directions.  One
direction takes you north and the other south.  A SIGN is perched on
the wall here for you to read.
9904.name: North/South Path

description: Several beds furnish along the western and eastern walls here.  A huge
set of stone weights are lying in the middle of the floor used for strength
training in keeping the guards physically fit.  Not much is to be seen in
the room but several lost guards from the past.  To the north takes you back
into the village where life resumes.
9966.name: Guard Room

description: B  E  W  A  R  E .....
T  H  E    M  O  N  S  T  E  R  . . . . . . . .
As you scan around the meadows, the landscape around you is typical,
matter of fact..  The scenery is pleasant.  The path here sways back and
forth a bit, as the road begins to make a very slight descent.  A distant
view of what seems to be a village is to the north.  A man-made SIGN is here
beside the road.
9917.name: Green Path

description: The stunning radiance of the scroll shop arouses your curiousity as you
enter.  Strange mystical portraits are hung across the western and eastern
walls here furnished with many abstract writings.  Several of these are
written in an unknown language leaving you in wonder.  A long glass display
is stood before you with many powerful scrolls shown only for show.  A
strange humming noise is felt within this room.  An exit leaves out north to
the main street.
9911.name: Enchanted Scrolls

description: You are trapped in a room with nothing to be seen, heard, or used.  Recall yourself out of here.. there is nothing here!
9918.name: Empty Room of Nothingness

description: The path ends here where nothing can be seen but a wail of breathing to
the north.  A dark cave is what you make of it but the overlapping blackness
leaves you in wonder of what to expect.
9921.name: Darkness in the Path

description: Well-made bricks overlay the street providing a path and comfort for
those moving from one place to another here.  The street is wide enough to
allow travellers to move easily here.  The ground is somewhat scattered with
soil as a janitor is in need to sweep up the road here.  A shop lies to the
south where adventurers can buy and sell armors of many kinds.  The street
continues west and east here.
9927.name: Southeast Main Street

description: The street suddenly curves to the west further into the village.  A
lot of grunting and clanking of stones can be heard at the small guard
station to the east where the cityguards dwell during their offtime
from patrolling the streets.
9977.name: Southeast Turn

description: This short walkway turns to the west quickly and south further into
the village.  Several portraits of lost warriors from the past hang on
the southern and eastern walls.  Small candles are hung beside them as
well.
9961.name: Western Turn

description: Welcome to the unknown village!  It seems that alot of activity seems to
be brewing as you enter the village.  Many travellers come from distant
lands in hopes of purchasing unique items sold here or to visit those that
dwell in this establishment.  The ground beneath you is well layered with a
hard brick surface allowing those to move about easily into the village.
Huge gates are standing to your west that lead itself out of town.  A dead
end can be seen distantly to your east as the path takes you deeper in this
animated village.
9901.name: Inside the Western Gates

description: You stumble across an empty, quiet lot just north of the bustling
city square.  The grass grows tall here and all about you are remnants
of trash and debris that once served, or continue to serve as
makeshift toys for the village children.  For some reason, this place
seems calm and serene.
9931.name: An Empty Lot Just North of the Square

description: This short walkway turns to the east quickly further into the
village.  Several portraits of lost warriors from the past hang on the
southern and western walls.  Small candles are hung beside them as
well.
9980.name: Western Turn

description: The road here slowly descends as the once dirt path is now replaced with
a clean cut shrubs of clovers turning to the west ahead where you see huge
trees slowly approaching.  To the north, the path makes a steady climb where
beyond, a faint structure of sorts can be seen.  A small centipede walks by
you and almost gets smushed..  Good job.  The trail twists sharply to the
west as the thick greeneries around you approach causing your eyes to squint
in the near darkness.
9920.name: Steady Path Slowly Descending

description: A man about his mid 20's... rather middle in frame and is ambitious in making as much gold as he can.
9920.room_name: A merchant is here eyeing on your valuables.
9920.name: A Merchant~

description:
Nothing special about him.  He looks at about 30-40 years of age.. somewhat bearded and mustache.. his hair going about every way and 
is dressed as any commoner would.  He seems occupied in search of buying something.
9921.room_name: A villager trots along here and goes about his everyday life ignoring you.
9921.name: A Village Commoner~

description: Short, small, young, but very keen and sneaky.. quick and aggressive.. lightning speed with his skills and almost reminiscent of Autolycus.
9922.room_name: A short little elven thief crouches and readys to attack you.
9922.name: A Sneaky Elven Thief~

description: He's old.. he stinks.. he smells like whiskey but he enjoys life soo much with that bottle in his hand.
9923.name: BUGGED VNUM~

description:
He is an eldery fellow with pure grey hair and a raspy beard.  He
looks very rugged in appearance, dirtied and emits a foul odor.
9924.room_name: A scribe is here strolling along and memorizing his spells.
9924.name: A Scribe of Holy Magic~

description:
His magnificent presence emits a imaginative glow about him leaving you
in awe.  His clothes and armor are grand as well as his royal standings.  A
former merchant Dzavar is now head of Dilp and serves to help those in need.
9925.room_name: Lord Dzavar, head of Hilp Village smiles as he walks by you.
9925.name: Lord Dzavar~

description: He's ugly, he's old, he smells like whiskey and seems happy about his health.
9926.room_name: An old drunk staggers about here almost knocking you down as he bumps into you.
9926.name: An Old Drunken Man~

description:
Big mama bear don't like you coming into her home and disturbing her
while hibernating.
9927.room_name: A humongous bear runs for you in rage!
9927.name: A ferocious bear~

9900.room_name: A shopkeeper dusts off the food with his hands here.
9900.name: The Shopkeeper of your food~

9901.room_name: A weapons keeper greets you and shows you his unique items.
9901.name: The Weapons Keeper~

9902.room_name: A man walks about here organizing his inventory while serving you.
9902.name: A Shopkeeper of Necessities~

9903.room_name: A shopkeeper eyes on you intently predicting your next purchase.
9903.name: A mage shopkeeper~

9904.room_name: A strange druid shopkeeper is here writing scrolls as you enter.
9904.name: A Shopkeeper of Scrolls~

9905.room_name: A tall elderly man is here to heal your wounds.
9905.name: The Healer of Restoration~

9906.room_name: A shopkeeper of armored items stands here cleaning a piece of armor.
9906.name: An Armor Shopkeeper~

9907.d_flags: D Honks and dives forward, biting its killer's finger.~
description:
Chat It's a goose.  But not just any goose, a wild goose!  Running
around Baldur's Gate, it could be found anywhere, and yet no one has
any idea how it got here...
9907.room_name: A wild goose honks at you loudly.
9907.name: a wild goose~

description: He's a huge guy.  About 6'3" and about 235 pounds.  Very stocky if you ask me.  Don't be mad at him please.
9910.room_name: A huge cityguard stands here on watch from passing travellers.
9910.name: A Grand Cityguard~

description: A huge specimen.. he greets you and welcomes you to the village and wishes you good fortune and amusement.
9911.room_name: A well-muscular cityguard welcomes you to Hilp Village.
9911.name: A Strong Cityguard~

description: He stands about 6'2" 200 pounds, has strong definition in his stature.  He wears a strange uniform signifying his role as a town guard.
9912.room_name: A villagetown sentinel roams about here watching you and everybody else.
9912.name: A Village Sentinel~

description:
This tall soldier is skinny in frame but stands grimly on guard ignoring
everything that happens before him.  His silence on guard patrol makes you
wonder and want to be just like him.
9913.room_name: A village soldier stands guard amongst the exits here.
9913.name: A Village Soldier~

description: He stinks, but he's buff.  Very stocky in frame and stands at about 6'3 220 pounds.
9914.room_name: A smelly guard is here working out and lifting weights as you enter.
9914.name: A Smelly Guard~

description:
You see an old man well in health and looking younger than what he is. 
He glows with a strange aura about him.  5'6" 145 pounds, he preaches of the
Word and the forthcoming of perils from the spirits within.
9915.room_name: A prophet stands here preaching the coming of Armaggedon.
9915.name: A Prophet of Prophecy~

description: He is sweating somewhat and is skinny in frame.  His middle-aged looks however make him look just like any other commoner you know.
9916.room_name: A weary-looking traveller wanders about seemingly lost.
9916.name: A Weary Traveller~

description:
He looks as if he's been recently in a gruesome battle.  Several blotches
of bloodstains are all over his muscular stature.  He stands at about 6'2
and is wearing some ripped up armor.
9917.room_name: A beaten and bruised paladin is here looking for food and healing.
9917.name: A Battered Paladin~

description: He is small.. he is soo cute.  Although he kind of looks dirty, the boy never ceases to amaze you.
9918.room_name: A small little boy smiles happily and gives you a flower.
9918.name: A Small Child~

description:
Just a common man draped in robes and wears a strange hat trying to discuss the essence of making gold and seems to take interest of your
interest in looking at him.
9919.room_name: An irritating merchant stands here blabbering and yapping about making gold.
9919.name: A Talkative Merchant~
